Package item.armor

Class Armor

java.lang.Object
item.CollectibleItem
item.armor.Armor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item, Upgradable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boots, Chestplate, Helmet, Leggings, Shield
public abstract class Armor extends CollectibleItem implements Upgradable
Represents an abstract class for armor items in the game. Armor items provide protection to the player, can be collected, upgraded, and fixed.

  • Method Details

    • use

      public void use(Character character)
      Allows the armor item to be used by the specified character. If the character is a player, this method attempts to equip the armor in the appropriate inventory slot. The item is only equipped if the target slot is valid and currently empty.
      Specified by:
      use in interface Item
      Parameters:
      character - the character using the armor; must be an instance of Player to be equipped

    • upgrade

      public void upgrade()
      This method upgrades current armor, by incrementing durability and protection
      Specified by:
      upgrade in interface Upgradable

    • fix

      public void fix()
      Restores the durability of the armor to its maximum durability level.
      Specified by:
      fix in interface Upgradable

    • protect

      public int protect(Player player)
      Reduces the armor's durability and provides protection to the player. If the armor is broken after reducing durability, it is removed from the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object that is being protected by the armor
      Returns:
      the protection value provided by the armor, or 0 if the armor is broken

    • isBroken

      public boolean isBroken()
